doc.title: ''Buddhist Monkey''
doc.plot: In this animated short by the creators of Happy Tree Friends Buddhist Monkey, a monkey who is very peaceful and relaxed, is meditating in the garden when all of the sudden he get's attacked by three green ninjas who damage the beautiful plants in his garden, including one flower that he loved the most, which causes him to get angry and show his amazing martial arts skills. Buddhist Monkey kills the three ninjas and goes back and uses all of his power to revive his favorite flower but this doesn't work so starts crying which makes the flower come back to life.
